title: [1.9-1.8.9][SeasonAPI——季节]让MC拥有季节
author: psk2001
txt_content:
本帖最后由 psk2001 于 2017-5-7 06:18 编辑 
感谢作者：EdwinMindcraft
：这是不用装PML核心的季节mod，这是一个没有物品添加的季节mod，这是一个使Mc更加真实的mod！
作者原文介绍（英文慎入）：
This mod adds seasons in minecraft, as well as a dynamic temperature calculation that allow snow to form in any biome (expect the ones without rain) in winter.
There is also an "hardcore" mode (available through config) that will make any living burn if they are in to hot environement or hyporthermia in lower temperatures.
Most of the features are described in changelogs so you might wanna check it
Note that this mod is in Alpha so bugs may appear...
Please note that this mod can cause severe performance issue due to heavy temperature calculations... I'll see what I can do to fix this but for now just keep this in mind.
For bug reports and requests please go on github.
Reworked temperature, should take less performances

这个mod给MC带来了春夏秋冬和动态温度，你可以通过改变config文件，打开困难模式（高温下烧伤，低温下冻伤）。所有的生物群系都可以下雪（那些不能降水的当然不行）！

注意：
温度计算可能降低帧率，该模组仍处于Alpha阶段，存在BUG（亲测良好！机房渣机带得起来！）

未发现不兼容mod（仍在测试其他mod兼容性，如有兼容问题请留言）
